Class JsonCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.steveleach.scoresheet.support.JsonCodec

  • public class JsonCodec
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts a ScoresheetModel to/from a JSON representation.
    Author:
    Steve Leach
